main event: Two brilliant red lights were observed by many sources in the area of Lancaster and Leona for approximately five minutes before they sped away.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be stationary at first before they descended toward the western horizon., One object moved in an easterly direction and traveled parallel to the horizon for about 10 seconds before disappearing., A State Fish & Game Warden and other witnesses corroborated the sighting at different locations., The witness report involved multiple civilians and sheriff deputies., The sighting coincided with clear weather conditions and visibility of 15 miles.
witness description: Sheriff deputies and civilians in the area.
